# NSCollectionLayoutGroupCustomItemProvider

**Type Alias**

A closure that creates and returns each of the custom group’s items.

## Declaration

```swift
typealias NSCollectionLayoutGroupCustomItemProvider = (any NSCollectionLayoutEnvironment) -> [NSCollectionLayoutGroupCustomItem]
```

## Discussion

You use a custom item provider to supply the item arrangement when creating a group using the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSCollectionLayoutGroup/custom(layoutSize:itemProvider:)] initializer.

## Advanced layouts

- **NSCollectionLayoutGroupCustomItem**: An item used in a group with a custom layout arrangement.
